arts.ttl: John Stones adds to Pep Guardiola problems for 'angry' Man City players
arts.sum: Manchester City are struggling but Pep Guardiola cannot put his finger on one problem when there are multiple

arts.ttl: James Maddison: “That’s what we want to showcase - it was all there”
arts.sum: “I’ve just said in a few interviews that these days don’t come around very often, against the champions, arguably the best team in Europe, Pep Guardiola’s side, so you have to enjoy them. I said to the boys, ‘it’s not often you’ll come to the champions and win 4-0’, so enjoy it.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs. Manchester City: Arne Slot Premier League title edge over Pep Guardiola after Tottenham Hotspur loss
arts.sum: Liverpool have a psychological edge over Premier League title rivals Manchester City and Arsenal, and are in pole position to take advantage of their stumbling opponents.

The practice isn't always that easy because they put pressure on you and I thought our build-up play today, at times we got a little bit stuck, especially in the second half, but we just persisted and persisted in trying to hit those areas that we needed to. I thought he was really good for us earlier in the season and then, yeah, he had a couple of sort of flat games but I think the whole team has.

arts.ttl: Pep Guardiola says two Tottenham stars showed their 'quality' in 4-0 Man City triumph
arts.sum: They ran the show at the Etihad...

arts.ttl: Gary Neville declares Manchester City are 'in DECLINE' after humiliating defeat by Spurs as Man United legend issues scathing verdict of Pep Guardiola's champions: 'Outplayed in every department'
arts.sum: City were humbled at home as they lost 4-0 against Ange Postecolgou's side, with James Maddison netting a brace and Pedro Porro and Brennan Johnson also scoring in the rout.

arts.ttl: Piers Morgan brutally trolls Erling Haaland after Man City thrashed at home to Tottenham
arts.sum: Manchester City and Erling Haaland endured another afternoon to forget against Tottenham on Saturday evening - and Piers Morgan couldn't wait to rub the striker's nose in it

arts.ttl: What next for Man City after stunning Spurs defeat?
arts.sum: It was meant to be a day of celebration but as Storm Bert made its way through England, Tottenham Hotspur blew away Manchester City's hopes and ambitions by beating them 4-0 - their heaviest Premier League defeat in SEVEN years. It was City's first defeat at the Etihad Stadium since they lost to Brentford in the Premier League in November 2022, ending their longest ever unbeaten run at home in all competitions (52 games).

arts.ttl: Man City rout a ‘significant’ step for Tottenham – Ange Postecoglou
arts.sum: Spurs won 4-0 at the Etihad Stadium to inflict a fifth straight loss on the defending Premier League champions.

arts.ttl: Man City 0-4 Tottenham: Pep Guardiola's side suffer worst losing run by defending champions for 68 years
arts.sum: Manchester City set an unwanted losing record after suffering a heavy 4-0 defeat at home to Tottenham Hotspur in the Premier League on Saturday evening.
